Workflow

Processing data

Fetch and trim DEM of a region

wells_eg_fixed
wells_eg_unfixed
wells_eg_unfixed
wells_elev()
Subset wells and add elevation
wells_export()
Export wells data for use in Strater and Voxler
wells_subset()
Subset wells to region
wells_yield()
Add yield lithology data to wells subset

Helper Functions

Functions you may not need, but might use for troubleshooting

lith_fix()
Fix lithology descriptions
fix_depth_mismatch()
Fix the depth of the well if not equal to final lithology
